name: Isohunt - Colors Tweak - Grey & Green (Dark)
description:
Check out the original style at userstyles.org
This style cleans up the Isohunt interface. It removes some of the banners and facebook applets. style 10539 by user 14196 is really nice, but hastn' been updated in a while. Isohunt won't be around for much longer, but I've updated that old style here.
